definition: medieval/Middle Ages/Chinese middle antiquity, 3rd to 9th centuries, including Sui and Tang Dynasties/Middle (of a language, e.g. Middle English)/used/second-hand
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: It is a fine example of contract civilization of medieval England's boroughs.
sentences.chinese: 这点可通过中古英国城市契约窥见一斑。

sentences.english: Since mediaeval times, velar and guttural and its opening closing mouth have had many transformations.
sentences.chinese: 中古以来牙喉音及其开合口发生了许多变化。

sentences.english: Outside the middle of second-hand clothes shop to match the latest LV bag.
sentences.chinese: 外着中古店淘来的二手衣服搭配LV最新款的纸袋。

sentences.english: During the Middle Ages, many Christians visited Rome because it was where the Pope lived.
sentences.chinese: 中古时代，许多基督徒因教宗住在当地而造访罗马。

sentences.english: Why is the Middle Ages also called the Dark Ages?
sentences.chinese: 为什么中古时代被称为黑暗时代？

sentences.english: Also, there is a great museum of medieval European art further up north.
sentences.chinese: 再往北一点，有欧洲中古世纪艺术的博物馆。

sentences.english: The client also should abide by mediaeval relic, can cut with a knives only feed.
sentences.chinese: 顾客也要遵循中古遗风，只能用一把刀子切食。

sentences.english: The two different depositional sequences in north and south domains indicate that these two domains developed independently.
sentences.chinese: 这表明黔中古隆起两侧的沈积域各力独立的系统。

sentences.english: The second chapter explores the relationship between Jia and Medieval Elegy.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，探讨笳与中古挽歌的关系。

sentences.english: This movie brought the Middle Ages to life.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影演活了中古世纪的情景。

sentences.english: Second: Analysis of the semantic direction of adverbs in the Book of Nan Qi Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为“《南齐书》中古副词语义指向分析”。

sentences.english: In the animated cartoon the ancient civilization fictionalizes cannot leave The use of traditional architecture.
sentences.chinese: 动画片中古文明的虚构离不开传统建筑的运用。

sentences.english: The Irish remained in small bands during the early Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 在中古时代初期，爱尔兰人只剩下少数的聚落。

sentences.english: Europe of 16-17th century was in a period of transformation from the Middle Age to modern time.
sentences.chinese: 17世纪的欧洲正处于一个中古向近代的转型时期。

sentences.english: Their culture dates back to the early modern era.
sentences.chinese: 他们的文化可以追溯到中古历史的前期。

sentences.english: Therefore, the small country still stays in the life style of mediaeval century.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这个小国目前仍处在中古世纪的生活状态中。

definition: the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
near ancient history (often taken to mean Song, Yuan, Ming and Qing times)
the imperial court/the government in imperial times

Five Legendary Emperors, usually taken to be the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] and four of his sons Zhuan Xu 顓頊|颛顼[Zhuan1 Xu1], Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4], Tang Yao 唐堯|唐尧[Tang2 Yao2], Yu Shun 虞舜[Yu2 Shun4]
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
